mapper.insert: insert into mission_accepted(mission_id, user_id, accepted_location) values(#{mission_id}, #{user_id}, #{accepted_location});
mapper.select: select mi.mission_id from mission_info mi left join mission_accepted ma ON mi.mission_id = ma.mission_id where ma.mission_id IS NULL and mi.user_id = #{user_id};
select mi.* from mission_info mi inner join mission_accepted ma on mi.mission_id = ma.mission_id where ma.user_id = #{user_id};
